function.description:
Runs an application and returns the output.
The result will contain the errors, the output, the runtime in milliseconds and the process' exit code. The directory parameter is the working directory where you would like the command to be executed.

example.title: Usage
Usage
example.header:
Copying a file in a specified working directory. In this specific example, the working directory is specified by C:/tmp. The source file source.jpg is copied and the name of the new file is target.jpg. The copy, i.e. target.jpg, is created in the specified working directory, in this case C:/tmp.
Possible output: {"errors":"","output":" 1 file(s) copied.\r\n","runtime":40,"exitCode":0}.
